Class CartManager

java.lang.Object
com.greengrocer.utils.CartManager
public class CartManager extends Object
Shopping Cart Manager for the current shopping session. Handles cart operations including merging same products. Uses Singleton pattern.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final double
    MINIMUM_CART_VALUE

    • getInstance

      public static CartManager getInstance()
      Gets the singleton instance.
      Returns:
      CartManager instance

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Product product, double quantity)
      Adds a product to the cart. If the product already exists, quantities are merged.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to add
      quantity - The quantity in kg

    • removeItem

      public void removeItem(int productId)
      Removes an item from the cart.
      Parameters:
      productId - The product ID to remove

    • updateQuantity

      public void updateQuantity(int productId, double newQuantity)
      Updates the quantity of an item in the cart.
      Parameters:
      productId - The product ID
      newQuantity - The new quantity
